messages.title: Bringing change to Worcester
messages.content: that benefits the many - not just the favoured few.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to keep police on our streets and protect our CCTV.
Support people-centred reform and improvement in our local NHS.
Champion for dignified care for the elderly.
Rebuild or refurbish every secondary school in Worcester.
Work to complete the new road including a new bridge.

issues.education: Mobile classrooms and leaky roofs should be a thing of the past. The future is about new school buildings; more one-to-one learning; a curriculum that enables all pupils to achieve their full potential.
issues.health: We now have a new hospital; three new GP surgeries and a walk-in centre. Matrons on our wards and record numbers of nurses, midwives and GPs.

contactInformation.address: Mike Foster, Open & Severn Street, Worcester, WR1 2ND.

endorsements.endorsement: "Mike Foster never gave up the fight for flood defences. Now they are here, it is such a relief. We're backing Mike because he never gave up."

images.caption: Mike went to see first hand how CCTV helps fight crime in the city centre. Picture copyright Worcester News
